original_text: Zerah the Cushite marched out against them with an army of thousands upon thousands and three hundred chariots, and came as far as Mareshah.
korean_text: 구스 사람 세라가 그들을 치려 하여 군사 백만 명과 병거 삼백 대를 거느리고 마레사에 이르매

sentences.original_text: Zerah the Cushite marched out against them
sentences.korean_translation: 구스 사람 세라가 그들을 치러 나아왔고

sentences.original_text: with an army of thousands upon thousands
and came as far as Mareshah
